content:
{
  "name": "voiceassist-web",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "lint": "eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --fix",
    "test": "NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' vitest run",
    "test:fast": "vitest run src/hooks/__tests__/useRealtimeVoiceSession.test.ts src/hooks/__tests__/useChatSession.test.ts src/__tests__/AppSmoke.test.tsx --reporter=basic",
    "test:watch": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' vitest --coverage",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:e2e:headed": "playwright test --headed",
    "test:e2e:dev": "E2E_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5173 playwright test",
    "test:a11y": "playwright test e2e/accessibility.spec.ts"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@hookform/resolvers": "^3.10.0",
    "@sentry/browser": "^8.42.0",
    "@tanstack/react-query": "^5.0.0",
    "@voiceassist/api-client": "workspace:*",
    "@voiceassist/types": "workspace:*",
    "@voiceassist/ui": "workspace:*",
    "@voiceassist/utils": "workspace:*",
    "@voiceassist/telemetry": "workspace:*",
    "axios": "^1.13.2",
    "framer-motion": "^11.15.0",
    "i18next": "^25.6.3",
    "i18next-browser-languagedetector": "^8.2.0",
    "idb": "^8.0.2",
    "katex": "^0.16.25",
    "lucide-react": "^0.555.0",
    "onnxruntime-web": "^1.20.0",
    "prism-react-renderer": "^2.4.1",
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "react-hook-form": "^7.66.1",
    "react-i18next": "^16.3.5",
    "react-markdown": "^10.1.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^7.9.6",
    "react-virtuoso": "^4.14.1",
    "rehype-katex": "^7.0.1",
    "remark-gfm": "^4.0.1",
    "remark-math": "^6.0.0",
    "zod": "^3.25.76",
    "zustand": "^4.5.7"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@playwright/test": "^1.57.0",
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^6.9.1",
    "@testing-library/react": "^16.3.0",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^14.6.1",
    "@types/react": "^18.2.0",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "@types/react-syntax-highlighter": "^15.5.13",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.47.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.47.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react-swc": "^3.0.0",
    "@vitest/ui": "^1.6.1",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.22",
    "axe-playwright": "^2.2.2",
    "eslint": "^9.39.1",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^10.1.8",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.5",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^7.0.1",
    "jsdom": "24.1.3",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.18",
    "typescript": "^5.0.0",
    "vite": "^5.0.0",
    "vite-plugin-pwa": "^1.1.0",
    "vitest": "^1.6.1",
    "workbox-window": "^7.4.0"
  }
}
